response.overview: Teenager Owen is just trying to make it through life in the suburbs when his classmate Maddy introduces him to a mysterious TV show — a vision of a supernatural world beneath their own. In the pale glow of the television, Owen’s view of reality begins to crack.
response.title: I Saw the TV Glow

cast.name: Emma Portner
cast.character: Amanda / Mr. Melancholy / Marco / Evil Clown

release_dates.note: South by Southwest Film & TV Festival
New York City, NY & Los Angeles, CA
